com.iff.onepairv2

Interface BackEndController


  • public interface BackEndController
    Interface for BackEndController that links the system to the backend server

      Constant created for the server's URL

      • addBlacklist

        @GET(value="addBlacklist/{uid1}/{uid2}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> addBlacklist(@Path(value="uid1")
                                                                                      java.lang.String uid1,
                                                                                      @Path(value="uid2")
                                                                                      java.lang.String uid2)
        HTTP request for storing a user in a blacklist in the server upon blocking a user
        Parameters:
        uid1 - User id of user blocking the other user
        uid2 - User id of user getting blocked
        Returns:
        void

      • addRequest

        @GET(value="addRequest/{uid}/{dealid}/{c}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> addRequest(@Path(value="uid")
                                                                                       java.lang.String uid,
                                                                                       @Path(value="dealid")
                                                                                       int dealid,
                                                                                       @Path(value="c")
                                                                                       java.lang.String c)
        HTTP request for user to find a match for a particular deal
        Parameters:
        uid - User id of current user
        dealid - Deal id of selected deal
        c - Category of deal
        Returns:
        void
